attributes.additional_details:
I/We would like to petition the Dept. for international Development to stop sending money abroad.

I/We ask this as we as a country cannot let money from the treasury to be used for this and should be used in the UK

We have people going hungry especially children everyday.  More and more people are using food banks
Most of the country we are sending money too really don't need the money for example India they have their own space programme.
Most of the countries we send money too have a dubious human rights record again India.

Please sign this petition and get the MPs to stop wasting our money abroad and then they can use it in the UK to help the people that deserve it.
